name: Bust Out
description:
This is the third an final game in the Busted Brats trilogy.

The game is a remake of the original Pang with a few changes and improvements.
For those not knowing the original: You have to shoot bouncing balls (aliens in this case) who split when you hit them with your laserbeam. The smaller the balls/aliens the lower their jumpheight is. The smallest balls will disappear of course when hit.
Unlike in the original the player can jump, steering is smoother, some levels are scrolling, you have more types of enemies and the bonusweapons actually help instead of hinder you.

If you want to play the whole Busted Brats story in the right order I reccoment to play the puzzlegame Suicide Mission and the platform-shooter Army Assets before this.

I hope you enjoy this game.

Features:
-Over 50 levels
-5 environments (with different daytimes)
-Several bonusitems
-Progress is saved after each larger mission
-Over 15 different enemies
-Bossfight
-Intro and outro animations
-Conclusion to the Busted Brats story
